channel.title: Need GFX coding Help! REAL BAD :P
channel.description: i wanna know how to edit the attack mode to GFX ( Special Attks ) instead of normal, can u get me or do i have to find out how to explain better? :( :P

item.title: Need GFX coding Help! REAL BAD :P
item.dc:creator: @yar_nova yar nova
item.description:
@yar_nova wrote:

Almost full special attacks, works with rune claws d hally d spear d scimmy barros and more.

find:

else { if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 864 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 806 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 807 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 808 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 809 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 810 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 811 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 863 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 865 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 866 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 867 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 868 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 869 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3176 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7639) { if (LoopAttDelay <= 1) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsDead == true) { ResetAttackNPC(); } else { //actionAmount++; setAnimation(GetWepAnim()); if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { hitDiff = EnemyHP; }

Under it add
Barrows specials:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730) { stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4745 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4749 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4751) { stillgfx(399, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4710 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4708 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4712 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4714) { stillgfx(400, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4732 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4736 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4738) { stillgfx(401, EnemyY, EnemyX); }

Other specials:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) { stillgfx(347, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377) { stillgfx(246, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3176) { stillgfx(477, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { stillgfx(341, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1249) { stillgfx(253, EnemyY, EnemyX); stillgfx(254, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3101) { stillgfx(274, EnemyY, EnemyX); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) { stillgfx(282, EnemyY, EnemyX); }

item.title: Need GFX coding Help! REAL BAD :P
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

add this with your commands

[code] if (command.startsWith(“gfx”)) {
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(absY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(absX - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(4);
outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7)
outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id
outStream.writeByte(0);//height of the spell above it’s basic place, i think it’s written in pixels 100 pixels high
outStream.writeWord(0);//Time before casting the graphic

}[/code]

save, compile.

when you play, type ::gfx ####

= any gfx code

Read full topic
